programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Rene and Casey display their confidence by arriving with a caravan of trucks; Darrell hopes to distract his competitors with doughnuts; Jarrod and Brandi plan an anniversary party for their store.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Mogul's Return!
programme.desc: Ivy makes money at an auction in Montclair; Darrell finds something that will launch him to new heights; Brandi worries that a hangover will compromise Jarrod's buying; Dave returns.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: A Very Miraculous Storage Wars Christmas
programme.desc: The buyers remain competitive while attending a white elephant gift exchange at Dan and Laura's house, with the event's proceeds going to charity.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi hope a special guest can sniff out the best lockers in West Covina, Calif.; Darrell and Brandon help their colleagues dress for success; Mary looks for vintage items.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dave makes his colleagues struggle when they return to his stomping grounds of Santa Ana, Calif.; Jarrod and Brandi are off their game; Ivy crashes the festivities and faces new bidding rivals.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.sub-title: I'd Do Anything for Lesa (but I Won't Do That)
programme.desc: In the town of DeSoto, Victor scores a find and rushes to the fire department; Jenny obtains some old furniture; tension between the women boils over.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The regulars encounter eager local bidders in the border city of Texarkana; Vic wins a unit with action figures; Jenny looks for diamonds in the rough; Ricky and Bubba find an unforgettable antique.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The bidders arrive in Arlington, Texas; Ricky and Bubba go the races; Vic eyes a unit with nefarious undertones; Moe operates at less than full strength.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The bidders journey to the Dallas suburb of Waxahachie; Ricky and Bubba score some green; Mary's scandalous find could earn her a huge profit; Marry gets a buzz from a hand-powered machine.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Victor meets a local beauty queen in the town of Hallsville; Ricky and Bubba compete with the crowds for a locker; Jenny explores a house of worship.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The Doc and the Junkster get desperate on the final day in Austin; Moe and Mary bid on a locker full of pinatas; Jenny seeks furniture, but obtains a new set of wheels instead.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.sub-title: Welcome to the World of Sonny Monday
programme.desc: The bidders make a return trip to the city of Waxahachie; Vic and his protege meet Jamie Benn of the Dallas Stars; Ricky and Bubba sail to Houston; Jenny is touched by something angelic.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Jenny uses her feminine wiles to get an edge up on her mostly male competitors; Ricky and Bubba set a record; Mary has second thoughts on a locker find that Moe feels is worthless.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The bidders hunt for rare art and designer furniture in Tyler, Texas; Lesa throws a tantrum; Bubba suffers from claustrophobia.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Moe and Mary uncover a rare piece of history during a stop in the city of Garland; Jenny becomes influenced by a popular book series; a buyer arrives loaded with cash.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Ricky and Bubba play up their country roots; Victor goes after a scooter potentially worth $3,000; a silver item takes storage gold.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The buyers brawl in the city of Henderson; Vic and Sonny receive a shot in the arm; Jenny arrives on four wheels.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Ricky and Bubba face off against Kenny and other locals in the eastern Texas city of Tyler; Jenny uncovers a holy grail of the music world.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The bidders look for deals in Mesquite, Texas; items procured include a refurbished pool table and vintage equestrian gear; Jenny suffers a head injury.
